description:
Dave Rubin of “The Rubin Report” talks about Donald Trump receiving a guilty verdict in his hush money trial in NY; the reactions to the Trump trial verdict from Elon Musk, Ron DeSantis, Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Ben Shapiro and Donald Trump. Dave also does a special “ask me anything” question-and-answer session on a wide-ranging host of topics, answering questions from the Rubin Report Locals community.
